response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its worth to you is $12,000. Considering this, I would like to offer it to you for $14,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value I place on the product and what you perceive its worth to be. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
